name: Chem-Words Review - Set 1
description:
This program is designed for reviewing and testing of a student’s knowledge of basic chemistry terminology as would be covered in a first year college or accelerated high school chemistry class.      It covers a total of 192 terms and definitions divided up into 3 main categories: 1) Matter & Energy, 2) Atomic Structure, and 3) Bonding. There are seven game screens. On each screen, a definition is presented at the bottom of the screen and the user must chose the correction term from the choice above. Both the arrangement of the answers and the order in which the definitions appear are randomized each time the level is played.  Users can press the “H” key in order to reveal the answer, but this will deduct increasing points from the score. A report at the end indicates which levels were played and a final total score.
This is a TOTAL FREEWARE Windows program. This means there are no ads, no registration, no collection of any data, no internet connection, and no limit to installations or distribution. The program will run on Windows versions 7 through 10.  Download the zipped setup program, extract it and run it. There is an uninstall option included.
